label: ID
description: This field stores the four-character ID that identifies the PrePetition Bal record.

label: OPENDATE
description: The system updates this field with the system date when the PrePetition Bal record is created.

label: CLOSEDATE
description: This field stores the date a PrePetition Bal record is closed.

label: RECORDCHANGEDATE
description: This field stores the system date when you create, change, or save the PrePetition Bal record.

label: LASTPAYMENTDATE
description: This field stores the date of the last pre-petition balance payment.

label: AMOUNTCODE
description: The amount code defines the amount in the PrePetition Bal record, and how the system processes loan balance transactions.

label: BALANCE
description: This field stores the current balance for the record.

label: BALANCEYTD
description: This field stores the total of all monies paid on the balance during the current year (to date).

label: BALANCELASTYEAR
description: This field stores the total of all monies paid on the balance during the previous year.

label: ORIGINALBALANCE
description: Functionality for this field will be available in a future release.

label: INCLUDEINLOANBAL
description: Functionality for this field will be available in a future release.

label: INCLUDEINCREDITRPT
description: Functionality for this field will be available in a future release.
